name: Smash the Meta!
description:
Are you quick enough to grab all the bites before the timer runs out?

Drag the star to slingshot around the map and find all the goodies. Collect sets of 3 to get an order out. You can't pick up 2 of the same item if its already in your order.

If this is getting you hungry, check out RocoMamas!

Record yourself playing this game then upload and tag @RocoMamas #RocoMeta. Post your best time!
